data.trans_hint: Ngân hàng sẽ tiến hành một cuộc điều tra nội bộ.
data.en_hint: The bank will conduct an internal investigation.
data.content_game_1: The bank will conduct an internal investigation.
data.answer_en_hint: The bank will conduct an internal investigation.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy đã đặt lịch hẹn gặp nha sĩ vào lúc 2 giờ.
data.en_hint: She made an appointment with his dentist for two o'clock.
data.content_game_1: She made an appointment with his dentist for two o'clock.
data.answer_en_hint: She made an appointment with his dentist for two o'clock.

data.trans_hint: Tất cả các bệnh viện ở Trung Quốc đều đang bị quá tải vì vi rút chết người.
data.en_hint: All the hospitals in China are overcrowded due to the deadly virus.
data.content_game_1: All the hospitals in China are overcrowded due to the deadly virus.
data.answer_en_hint: All the hospitals in China are overcrowded due to the deadly virus.

data.trans_hint: Sau khi xem xét các triệu chứng của bệnh nhân và xem kết quả xét nghiệm, bác sĩ đã chẩn đoán khối u là lành tính.
data.en_hint: After considering the patient's symptoms and looking at her test results, the doctor diagnosed the lump as benign.
data.content_game_1: After considering the patient's symptoms and looking at her test results, the doctor diagnosed the lump as benign.
data.answer_en_hint: After considering the patient's symptoms and looking at her test results, the doctor diagnosed the lump as benign.

data.trans_hint: Bệnh nhân không được phép ra khỏi bệnh viện.
data.en_hint: Victims are not permitted to go out of the hospital.
data.content_game_1: Victims are not permitted to go out of the hospital.
data.answer_en_hint: Victims are not permitted to go out of the hospital.

data.trans_hint: Ngoài các dịch vụ lâm sàng chuyên nghiệp, bệnh viện có thể chọn ký hợp đồng cho các dịch vụ hỗ trợ từ bác sĩ.
data.en_hint: In addition to professional clinical services, the hospital may choose to contract for support services from the physician practice.
data.content_game_1: In addition to professional clinical services, the hospital may choose to contract for support services from the physician practice.
data.answer_en_hint: In addition to professional clinical services, the hospital may choose to contract for support services from the physician practice.

data.trans: Sự bình phục (sức khỏe), hồi phục (kinh tế)
data.trans_hint: Bố tôi đã hoàn toàn bình phục sau cuộc phẫu thuật.
data.en_hint: My father has made a full recovery from the operation.
data.content_game_1: My father has made a full recovery from the operation.
data.answer_en_hint: My father has made a full recovery from the operation.

data.trans: Sự an toàn, sự an ninh
data.trans_hint: Để giữ an toàn cho nhân viên, bệnh nhân và du khách, các bệnh viện sử dụng một loạt các biện pháp an ninh, bao gồm sử dụng camera quan sát.
data.en_hint: To keep staff, patients and visitors safe, hospitals use a range of security measures, including the use of CCTV cameras.
data.content_game_1: To keep staff, patients and visitors safe, hospitals use a range of security measures, including the use of CCTV cameras.
data.answer_en_hint: To keep staff, patients and visitors safe, hospitals use a range of security measures, including the use of CCTV cameras.

data.trans: Cao cấp, cấp trên, lớn tuổi hơn
data.trans_hint: Bác sĩ cao cấp mang dụng cụ của mình trong một chiếc túi da màu đen.
data.en_hint: The senior physician carried his instruments in a black leather bag.
data.content_game_1: The senior physician carried his instruments in a black leather bag.
data.answer_en_hint: The senior physician carried his instruments in a black leather bag.

data.trans: Thiết lập, xây dựng, chuẩn bị sẵn sàng
data.trans_hint: Bệnh viện đã xây dựng một quỹ đặc biệt để mua các thiết bị y tế mới.
data.en_hint: The hospital has set up a special fund to buy new medical equipments.
data.content_game_1: The hospital has set up a special fund to buy new medical equipments.
data.answer_en_hint: The hospital has set up a special fund to buy new medical equipments.

data.trans_hint: Trước khi tiến hành một cuộc đại phẫu thuật, tốt hơn hết bạn nên trao quyền quyết định cho người thân phòng khi có chuyện gì xảy ra.
data.en_hint: Before major surgery, it is a good idea to give decision-making authority to a close relative in case something happens to you.
data.content_game_1: Before major surgery, it is a good idea to give decision-making authority to a close relative in case something happens to you.
data.answer_en_hint: Before major surgery, it is a good idea to give decision-making authority to a close relative in case something happens to you.

data.trans_hint: Bằng việc trị liệu vật lý, bạn sẽ có thể đi lại được.
data.en_hint: With physical therapy, you should eventually be able to walk again.
data.content_game_1: With physical therapy, you should eventually be able to walk again.
